newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Bchem, Danubius hit highs as Hungary shares rise.
newsitem.headline: Bchem, Danubius hit highs as Hungary shares rise.

text.p: 1405 GMT - Hungarian share prices closed higher on Tuesday led by energy, chemicals, hotel and pharmaceuticals shares.
* The BUX index finished at 3,784.98 points, up 30.73.
* Fifteen stocks ended higher, eight finished lower and nine remained steady.
* Chemicals firm Borsodchem hit a new all-time high of 3,730 forints before ending at 3,725 forints, up 50.
* Danubius also hit new record high of 3,600.
* Oil firm MOL closed at 1,860 forints, up 25.
* Spot share turnover totalled 1.35 billion forints.
